member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates how much free space on a page (in percentage terms) should be reserved for formation of a new page. The value should be set in the range from 0 to 100. If the value is 100 then, in any case, a new page will be formed. This property is used together with the StartNewPage property.

member.summary: Gets or sets value indicates that the footer is printed at bottom of page.

member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates whether the component can or cannot break its contents on several pages.

member.summary: Divides content of components in two parts. Returns result of dividing. If true, then component is successful divided.
member.param: Component for store part of content.
member.returns: If true, then component is successful divided.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiDynamicBand.NewPageBefore
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, before output of a band, a new page will be generated. Output of a band will be continued on the next page.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiDynamicBand.NewPageAfter
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, after output of a band, a new page will be generated.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiDynamicBand.NewColumnBefore
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, before output of a band, a new column will be generated. Output of a band will be continued on the next column.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiDynamicBand.NewColumnAfter
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, after output of a band, a new column will be generated.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiDynamicBand.SkipFirst
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, a new page/column will be generated only starting from the second case.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiDynamicBand.BreakIfLessThan
member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates how much free space is on a page (in per cent) should be reserved for formation of a new page or a new column. The value should be set in the range from 0 to 100. If the value is 100 then, in any case, a new page or a new column will be formed. This property is used together with NewPageBefore, NewPageAfter, NewColumnBefore, NewColumnAfter properties.

member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, after output of a band, a new page will be generated.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.IStiPageBreak.BreakIfLessThan
member.summary: Gets or sets value which indicates how much free space is on a page (in per cent) should be reserved for formation of a new page or a new column. The value should be set in the range from 0 to 100. If the value is 100 then, in any case, a new page or a new column will be formed. This property is used together with NewPageBefore, NewPageAfter, NewColumnBefore, NewColumnAfter properties.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Components.IStiPageBreak.SkipFirst
member.summary: If the value of this property is true, then, a new page/column will be generated only starting from the second case.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.IsCanBreak(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: If a container can be broken into two parts, then returns true for the. True is returned, if the container realizes IStiBreakable interface and CanBreak is true, or ParentBand realizes IStiBreakable interface and CanBreak is true.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.IsNeedBreak(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Returns true, if a container is to be broken and can be broken. A container may need in breaking, if it is higher than free space available for output. The ability of break is checked with the IsCanBreak method.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.Break(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Breaks the specified container in two parts which are "Continued" and "Breaked", where the "Continued" is a container, which should be output on the next page and "Breaked" is a container which will be output on the current page. A container passed as the originalContainer method parameter contains the "Breaked" container. This method returns the "Continued" container.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiBreakableHelper.SetCanBreak(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Sets the CanBreak property for all components. Do not set CanBreak to true for CrossFields and SubReports.

member.summary: Checks the specified container on necessity to use the Breakable interface. Until a container cannot be placed completely on a page (and it can be broken) it is broken and output on pages.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Engine.StiPrintAtBottom.Render(Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer,System.Int32,Stimulsoft.Report.Components.StiContainer)
member.summary: Finds all elements from the specified container of output and outputs them on a new page. Outputs elements which are found before the container-marker. The rest of elements will be moved on the next page. All elements should be found in a previously compiled list of bands which are output on the bottom of a page. When processing, a new vertical position on the bottom of a page is set.
member.param: A container in what bands should be output.
The Index starting with what it is necessary to find a container-marker. The Index is specified because there is no need to process again previously output clumns on a page.
A container-marker after what all containers will be moved on the next page.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfExportService.ExportPdf(Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport,System.IO.Stream,Stimulsoft.Report.StiPagesRange,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exports a document to the pdf file.
member.param: A report which is to be exported.
A stream for export of a document.
Describes pages range of the document for the export.
A float value that sets the quality of exporting images. Default value is 1.
A float value that sets the resolution of exporting images. Default value is 100.
If embeddedFont is true then, when exporting, fonts of the report will be included in the resulting document.
If standardPdfFont is true then, when exporting, non-standard fonts of the report will be replaced by the standard fonts in resulting document.
A parameter which controls a compression of the exported pdf document.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges
member.summary: Enumeration describes possible user access privileges to the pdf document. User access privileges are managed by the user password. Owner with the correct owner password has all possible privileges for the content of the pdf document and a rule for setting document permissions.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.None
member.summary: User password allows only opening the pdf document, decrypt it, and display it on the screen.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.PrintDocument
member.summary: User password allows opening the pdf document, decrypt it, display it on the screen and print its content.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.ModifyContents
member.summary: User password allows modifying the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.CopyTextAndGraphics
member.summary: User password allows copying text and graphics objects from the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.AddOrModifyTextAnnotations
member.summary: User password allows adding or modifying text annotations in the content of the pdf document.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiUserAccessPrivileges.All
member.summary: User password allows all modifications on the content of the pdf document.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength
member.summary: Enumeration which sets an encryption key length of the resulting pdf file.

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit40
member.summary: RC4 algorithm, 40 bit encryption key length (Acrobat 3).

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit128
member.summary: RC4 algorithm, 128 bit encryption key length (Acrobat 5).

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit128_r4
member.summary: AES algorithm, 128 bit encryption key length, revision 4 (Acrobat 7).

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit256_r5
member.summary: AES algorithm, 256 bit encryption key length, revision 5 (Acrobat 9).

member.name: F:Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiPdfEncryptionKeyLength.Bit256_r6
member.summary: AES algorithm, 256 bit encryption key length, revision 6 (Acrobat X).

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport.PrintToDotMatrixPrinter(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,Stimulsoft.Report.Export.StiTxtBorderType,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Prints report to dot-matrix printer in the RAW mode.

A parameter which sets text encoding.
If true then borders are exported to the text.
Type of borders (StiTxtBorderType).
If true then empty lines will be removed from the result text.
If true then empty lines with vertical borders will be removed from the result text.
If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
Horizontal zoom factor by X axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
Vertical zoom factor by Y axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
A number of the first page to print.
A number of the last page to print.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport.DefaultReportLanguage
member.summary: Returns the default language of the report. StiReport.DefaultReportLanguage property is obsolete. Please use StiOptions.Engine.DefaultReportLanguage property.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport.ReportType
member.summary: Returns the default report type. Default report type will be used in report designer to specify type of created report. StiReport.DefaultReportLanguage property is obsolete. StiReport.ReportType property is obsolete. Please use StiOptions.Engine.BaseReportType property instead it.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport.HideMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets the value, which does not allow to show the messages from the engine of messages. StiReport.HideMessages property is obsolete. Please use StiOptions.Engine.HideMessages property instead it.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport.HideExceptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the value, which does not allow to show the exceptions from the engine of exceptions. StiReport.HideExceptions property is obsolete. Please use StiOptions.Engine.HideExceptions property instead it.

member.summary: Prints a report to dot-matrix printer in RAW mode.

A parameter which sets text encoding.
If true then borders are exported to a text.
Type of borders.
If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
A number of the first page to print.
A number of the last page to print.

member.summary: Prints report to dot-matrix printer in the RAW mode.
member.param: A name of the printer.
A parameter which sets text encoding.
If true then borders are exported to the text.
Type of borders.
If true then empty lines will be removed from the result text.
If true then empty lines with vertical borders will be removed from the result text.
If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
Horizontal zoom factor by X axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
Vertical zoom factor by Y axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
A number of the first page to print.
A number of the last page to print.
Use Escape codes in text.
Name of the Escape codes collection to use.

member.summary: Returns string representation of a report in the dot-matrix mode.
member.param: A parameter which sets text encoding.
If true then borders are exported to the text.
Type of borders.
If true then empty lines will be removed from the result text.
If true then empty lines with vertical borders will be removed from the result text.
If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
Horizontal zoom factor by X axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
Vertical zoom factor by Y axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.
A range of pages for exporting.
Use Escape codes in text.
Name of the Escape codes collection to use.
member.returns: A string which contains a string representation of a report in the dot-matrix mode.

member.summary: Prints the rendered report. If the report is not rendered then its rendering starts.

If true then borders are exported to the text.

If true then empty lines will be removed from the result text.

If true then the EOF character will be added to the end of each page.
If true then all long lines will be cut.
Horizontal zoom factor by X axis. By default a value is 1.0f what is equal 100% in export settings window.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Func.Ru.Decline(System.Decimal,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the correct declension of names of roubles or kopecs of the currency.
member.param: A value containing a currency on which the resulting value depends.
This parameter will be used if the value parameter ends with 1.
This parameter will be used if the value parameter ends with 2,3,4.
This parameter will be used if the value parameter ends with other numbers and values which ends with numbers between 10 and 20.
member.returns: Returns the value of one, two or five parameter. Depends on the value parameter.

member.returns: Returns the value of one, two or five parameter. Depends on the value parameter.
